title: Cranberry Almond Vinaigrette
ingredients: ['125ml cranberry juice', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon dried cranberries, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon finely chopped shallot', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh parsley', '2 teaspoons ground almonds', '1/2 teaspoon crushed red chilli flakes', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '75ml vegetable oil']
